item.title: Voicebots are the new IVR for Contact Centers
item.description: Photo source: Pixabay. Creative Commons. The Contact Center Voice Channel may not going away in the “short time”, but it will be progressively supplemented by Voicebots in the next few years… Past months, Googleâ€™s Duplex demo forced us to think more about a world where we might get a random call from a business and not realize it is a robot making the call. Recent proof of concepts have verified that this technology is not just a staged demo but it actually works.
